title: Does Riot ever ban the scripters in coop vs ai games?
body:
This is like the 5th time I've had 4 script team in my coop vs ai game in a while. Sadly this time I picked a support and lost the game. I've reported every time I see bots and I never see any of them get processed. Does Riot not take care of these and do they not look at reports from a single person in the game? Every coop vs ai game I play once in a while, there are at least 2 scripters in every game (literally).

It's fucking stupid and it wastes my time when I just play it to get the win of the day; makes 15 minute game take 30 minutes, and I've just lost one sadly.

Remove my fucking history of losing to coop vs ai intermediate because its embarrassing and please process my reports.
